document.full_text: the u.n. peacekeeping mission to ivory coast said laurent gbagbo's forces were readying an attack helicopter and multiple rocket launchers on tuesday and condemned the growing use of heavy weapons against civilians.
document.title: ivory coast's gbagbo readying rockets, helicopter: u.n.
lines_and_colors: the u.n. peacekeeping mission to ivory coast said laurent gbagbo's forces were readying an attack helicopter and multiple rocket launchers on tuesday and condemned the growing use of heavy weapons against civilians.
